raw_comment: I noticed that the southern states will be getting the 'first leaf' appearance rather than the northern states. I wonder what causes the strange placement of purple areas on the map. Is it the altitude? This graph shows that spring moves from the south of the United States to the Northern part. A good title for this graph may be, "An Evolution of Spring."
ace_sentences: I noticed that the southern states will get the first-leaf appearance earlier than the northern states.
I wonder what causes the placement of the purple areas on the map.
Maybe altitude causes the placement of the purple areas on the map.
The graph shows that spring moves from the south of the United States to the north of the United States.
A good title for this graph may be "An Evolution of Spring".
